## Checklist

<!-- Go through this checklist before submitting -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's coding standards
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] No sensitive information (API keys, passwords) is included

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the README.md (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation in `/docs` (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md with my changes
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions

### Database & Schema

- [ ] No database schema changes
- [ ] Database schema changes are documented
- [ ] Migration scripts are included (if applicable)

### Dependencies

- [ ] No new dependencies added
- [ ] New dependencies are justified and documented
- [ ] Dependencies are production-ready and well-maintained

### Breaking Changes

- [ ] This PR does not introduce breaking changes
- [ ] Breaking changes are documented in CHANGELOG.md
- [ ] Migration guide is provided for breaking changes
